channel.title: Staff items
channel.description:
Well, the purpose of this thread is that staff items can be worn by anyone. Like, an owner cape worn by a moderator.
How could I fix this? I tried adding a req like Attack; Gs needs 75 attack but it didn't work. How could I change it??
Please, help. REP++

item.title: Staff items
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

He put it where he was told to, It wasnt his fault.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff items
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:18, topic:281226”]I just PMed you the working solution and will share it here for everyone in the future

Locate

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

And fill it out as

if (wearID == **** && playerRights < 1) { sM("You need to be a member of the staff to wear this cape."); return false; }[/quote]
Thanks, this worked:P. REP++ for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff items
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I just PMed you the working solution and will share it here for everyone in the future

Locate

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) {

And fill it out as

if (wearID == **** && playerRights < 1) { sM("You need to be a member of the staff to wear this cape."); return false; }

item.title: Staff items
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

What you mean… Like the item ID or what I put for your suggestion?

My ID’s =
Mod Cape: 13966
Admin Cape: 13965
Owner Cape: 13964

What I put for your suggestion:

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 13966 && playerRights < 1) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], 3); sM("You can't wield this cape, you need to be Staff"); } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 13965 && playerRights < 2) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], 3); sM("You can't wield this cape, you need to be Staff"); } if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 13964 && playerRights < 3) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], 3); sM("You can't wield this cape, you need to be Staff"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Staff items
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

[quote=“o.O O.o, post:4, topic:281226”]public int isStaff() { try { BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/staff.txt")); String data = null; while ((data = in.readLine()) != null) { if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(data)) { return 5; } } } catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("Critical error while checking staff!"); e.printStackTrace(); } return 0; }

checkstaff(); if(checkstaff() == 5) isStaff = 1; if(checkStaff() == 0) isStaff= 0;

That should work.
As long as you change everything accordingly. But you should be smart enough to do that.[/quote][quote=“kickingjamie, post:5, topic:281226”] if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == id && playerRights < 3) { remove(playerEquipment[playerCape], 3); sendMessage("You can't wield such cape");[/quote]

None worked, :(. Well, I tried… Anymore suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: Staff items
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

public int isStaff() { try { BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("./data/staff.txt")); String data = null; while ((data = in.readLine()) != null) { if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(data)) { return 5; } } } catch (IOException e) { System.out.println("Critical error while checking staff!"); e.printStackTrace(); } return 0; }

checkstaff(); if(checkstaff() == 5) isStaff = 1; if(checkStaff() == 0) isStaff= 0;

That should work.
As long as you change everything accordingly. But you should be smart enough to do that.

Read full topic
